GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation to get the export for the defined scope by export name.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update a export. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update a export. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete a export.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: The operation to list all exports at the given scope.

OtherOperations.Name: Execute
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to run an export.

OtherOperations.Name: GetExecutionHistory
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to get the run history of an export for the defined scope and export name.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the view by view name.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update a view. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update a view. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete a view.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the view for the defined scope by view name.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update a view. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to create or update a view. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete a view.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all views at the given scope.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the alert for the scope by alert ID.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the alerts for scope defined.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetCostManagementAlerts
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists the Alerts for external cloud provider type defined.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the private scheduled action by name.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a private scheduled action.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Create or update a private scheduled action.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the shared scheduled action from the given scope by name.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update a shared scheduled action within the given scope.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Create or update a shared scheduled action within the given scope.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Delete a scheduled action within the given scope.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List all shared scheduled actions within the given scope.

OtherOperations.Name: RunByScope
OtherOperations.Description: Runs a shared scheduled action within the given scope.
